articles.title: Apple strikes chip supply agreement with Qualcomm, suggesting it isn't yet ready to go it alone
articles.description: Apple's deal with Qualcomm indicates the tech giant isn't ready to rely on its in-house chips just yet.
articles.content:
Apple (AAPL) and Qualcomm (QCOM) revealed on Monday they've struck a new chip supply agreement.
The partnership stipulates that Qualcomm will provide its Snapdragon 5G Modemâ€‘RF Systems for Apple's smartphone launching from 2024 to 2026. The financial... [2648 chars]

articles.title: Here's the sunnier side of the Apple stock sell-off: Morning Brief
articles.description: At least the interest rate outlook has become clearer for tech investors.
articles.content:
Amazing how one minuscule headline could take down shares of tech titan Apple (AAPL).
As Yahoo Finance's Jared Blikre wrote on Friday in this space, Apple's stock tanked 6% from Wednesday's opening bell to Thursday's close. It marked the biggest back... [2643 chars]

articles.title: Pixel Watch 2 gets set to take on Galaxy Watch 6 and Apple Watch Series 9 in India
articles.description: Google is scheduled to host the Made by Google event on October 4 in New York.The tech giant will launch the Pixel 8 series and the Pixel Watch 2 at the event.Google
articles.content:
Google is scheduled to host the Made by Google event on October 4 in New York.
The tech giant will launch the Pixel 8 series and the Pixel Watch 2 at the event.
Google has announced that the Pixel Watch 2 will be launched in India on October 5.
